channel.title: What Da Hex!
channel.description: Recent content on What Da Hex!

item.description: Today is the first day on a long way to transformation.. This is how my refridgerator looks like: All stocked and ready! Eggs! A lot of them :P

item.title: Factorial
item.description: This is my first post and hence I have chosen the topic, Factorials. It is very simple to write about and in the process will help me get acquainted to writing and publishing a post. So let's get started. What is a factorial? In mathematics, the factorial of a positive integer n, denoted by n!, is the product of all positive integers less than or equal to n. 1

item.title: About
item.description: Hi, I am Faiz Ilahi Kothari. I currently work at Cisco Systems India. This blog is kind of a weblog of my learnings and is a collection of random musings. Don't expect it to help you conquer Earth or wash your laundry. You are free to use the whole or part of the content at your own peril ðŸ˜¬. Shoot me a mail at faiz.off93@gmail.com Disclaimer: The views and thoughts expressed on this site don't necessarily reflect that of my employer.
